#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value

#Text=Sokka says : " So some people do n't like you , big deal !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sure you can !
#Text=A little swish - swish - swish !
#Text=Airbending slice !
#Text=And we 're on our way !
#Text=" Katara says : " I think what " Master Swish " is trying to say is that you 're supposed to be out saving the world .
#Text=You ca n't do that locked up in here .
#Text=" Aang says : " I ca n't do that with people thinking I 'm a murderer either .
#Text=I need you guys to help prove my innocence .
#Text=" Sokka says : " How 're we gon na to do that ?
#Text=The crime happened over three hundred years ago .
#Text=" Aang says : " That 's okay , Sokka .
#Text=For some reason , I thought you were an expert detective .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , I guess I could be classified as such .
#Text=" Katara says : " Yeah !
#Text=Back home , he was famous for solving the mystery of the missing seal jerky .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Everyone wanted to blame it on the polar leopard , but I figured out it was Old Man Jarko wearing polar leopard boots !
#Text=See , a real eight hundred - pound polar leopard would have left much deeper tracks .
#Text=Okay , I guess I am pretty good .
#Text=" Aang says : " So , you 'll help me with my case ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fine !
#Text=But I 'm going to need some new props .
#Text=I 'm ready .
#Text=What ?
#Text="
